name: Wizzerd Quest
description:
Welcome to the mysterious land of Wayword!

Wizzerd Quest is a bite-sized open-world RPG with full splitscreen co-op. Its aesthetic and gameplay sit somewhere between DOOM and Daggerfall, and it's designed to be a fun little excursion without wasting your time. The full game, which is totally free, includes:

  • A main story quest that takes you all around the open world (Takes ~3 hrs to beat the game)
  • 6 classes, assigned dynamically based on leveling
  • 8 enemy types plus two bosses
  • 12 hand-crafted dungeons
  • 3 towns with facilities such as banks and traders
  • Over 40 NPCs, all with unique, witty and funny (according to the devs) dialogue
  • A full day-night cycle
  • A voiced opening cutscene with cringe voice acting straight out of 1995
  • The ability to ATTEMPT BARTERING WITH FARM ANIMALS
  • Absolutely ZERO microtransactions, network telemetry or invasive DRM

Kondoorsoft offers this game to you totally free of charge. But make no mistake: this is no mere marketing demo. It's a full game, given freely to the community in the hopes that it will bring entertainment to those that play it. But if you like it and wish to support us, consider looking at the rest of our game catalog.
